transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello yes ma'am.
Customer: Haan ji sir. Sir actually aapne jo call ki thi na wo apne customer care pe ki thi.
Executive: Haan madam to jo stone ke mere paas aapke yahan se call aaya tha ek india mart ke number se hi mere paas save hai na phone mein.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Unse meri baat hui thi stone ke to unhe video vagarah photo vagarah bhejne hai alag se stone ke ji ji ji jo live chal rahi ho to madam unka number nahi show kar raha whatsapp mein wo aap hi ka number aa raha call kar raha hu to kat ja raha hai turant.
Customer: Achcha achcha.
Executive: Ji. Sir main abhi aapko solution ji. Abhi madam maine na paanch minute pehle baat ki hogi client se.
Customer: Achcha achcha. To sir ji madam wohi number kiya tha mere ko to maine abhi aapko solution bataya na lead manager wala wo aapne karke dekha? Gaya hu madam usme to isme to dikha raha hai ek address isi mein aapko call karke dekhta hu abhi.
Customer: Sir actually mein aapne jo matlab call customer care pe kar di thi na aapko koi issue rehta hai aap mujhe connect kar liya kare aapke paas mera number to hai.
Customer: Haan malvika bol rahe ho na aap? Haan ji malvika main bol rahi hu. To agar koi issue rehta hai na to aap mujhe connect kar liya kariye agar aap customer care pe call kiya hai na to ek issue raise hota hai to main wo issue ko close kar du ab.
Customer: Kaika sir? Main ye bol rahi hu sir ki jab aapne customer care pe call ki thi na to uski wajah se issue raise ho gaya hai to main issue close kar du.
Executive: Haan wo hata dijiye phir. Theek hai sir main aapko directly isi number mein call kar liya karunga.
Customer: Theek hai haan ji jab bhi aapko issue hota hai na to aap customer care tak agar mujhse call nahi ho to customer care pe call kiya kariye otherwise aap mujhe connect kar liya kariye pehle. Theek hai madam. Aur koi issue to nahi hai aapko aa raha hai kuch bhi buyleads vagarah se related issue? Nahi nahi madam koi issue nahi aa raha par yehi hai madam ki mere paas jaise client jo call kar rahe hain wo keh rahe hain ki humne to apne near by mein manga tha hame bahut lamba de diya aap logon ne. Chalo theek hai wo to hamare upar hai hum kaise unko deal karte hain. matlab ye buyer bolte hain ki aapko issue reh raha hai?
Executive: Buyer ko issue hai na madam jyada to. Kuchhi bande ko issue hai na wo to hame sunai deta hai pehle ki abhi bhi trolley ki leads thi jo wo kehta hai maine near by ke liye manga tha abhi kiye mere ko. To bola main aapko batata hu thodi der mein abhi phir. Achcha sir aap ek kaam kariye na jo buyleads aapko aapke location ki nahi lag rahi hai agar kuch to maine aapko bataya tha wo 10 din wale time pe mention karne ko uske alava aap ek baar follow up liya kariye jaise aapne ma abhi baat ho rahi hai jaise kisi buyer se abhi baat hui hai theek hai aap send vend karne ke baad bhi ek baar do teen din se phir connect kar lijiyega. Taki usko multiple options mil rahe hai na to agar aap feedback rakhoge aap baar baar follow up karoge na to usko thoda interest show hoga ki matlab ye log koi connect karna chah raha hai baar baar. To aap is baar follow up lijiye aur apne according agar kuch bhi problem rehti hai kuch bhi to aap mujhe connect kar lijiyega. Agar kabhi aapke app mobile mein app to hoga na india mart ka? Haan haan haan haan. To sir abhi aap mere samne matlab call ko speaker pe kar dijiye. Aur ek baar se message karke dekhiye dekhiye message ho pa raha hai aapke? Ye bhi paanch minute pehle. Haan ji? Paanch minute pehle aaya tha abhi. Sir main call ki baat nahi maine bataya na lead manager mein aapko call show ho jayegi aap phone speaker pe rakhiye aur wo call maine le li hai par wo number liya hai usi number ko laga ke dekhta hu madam ek baar aap. Achcha achcha wo wo aapne laga ke dekhta hu abhi call. Achcha theek hai aapko se dekh lijiye agar koi issue rehta hai to mujhe connect kar lijiyega. Theek hai madam theek hai baat karta hu. Theek hai. Theek hai sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving calls from clients.

- Customer is receiving leads from distant locations.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested using the lead manager.

- Executive suggested following up with clients.

- Executive offered direct assistance for future issues.

- Executive offered to close the customer care ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will try calling the client again.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, follow up, lead manager, location
